author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
The Legend of Zelda movie finally has a release date: March 26th, 2027. For such an anticipated project, Nintendo chose the most low-key way of announcing the date: via their new Nintendo Today news app. They did just have a Nintendo Direct yesterday, which did not contain any mention of the movie, and they also have a Switch 2-focused Direct next week; both of those would have more obvious options to drop the news. Elsewhere in games, Ubisoft and Tencent have formed a new subsidiary company that will handle some of Ubi's big IPs like Far Cry, Rainbow Six, and Assassin's Creed. And finally, new Sims challenger InZOI is still in early access, and players have already found a bug that will let you run over children with a car. Yes, it's already patched.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: The Legend of Zelda Live-Action Movie Has a Release Date - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
title: Young Mazino explains why Jesse likes to go on solo patrols in The Last of Us 👀 #thelastofus #ign

author: IGN
description:
Whether you're building your dream house or buying a new car to keep your Zois happy, making money is essential in inZOI. Sure, you can go the traditional route of getting a job and going to work every day to scrape by with a modest salary. You could invest in skills to become a talented artist or programmer, making big bucks on your masterpieces. But if all of that takes too much effort, then using the InZOI money cheat is the quickest way to get rich with just a click of a button!

For more inZOI tips and tricks, check out our growing Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/inzoi/

#IGN #Gaming
title: InZOI: The Easiest Way to Make Money FAST!

author: IGN
description:
Check out the opening moments of Schedule I, a brand-new game from TVGS. In Schedule I, you'll start from humble beginnings as a low-level drug dealer, and you'll use your skills to grow and deal drugs from a motel room in an attempt to grow your empire. Yes, those are very real words we just typed. Enjoy!

#IGN #Gaming
title: Schedule I: The First 16 Minutes of Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Inspired by films like Toy Story and Small Soldiers, Hypercharge: Unboxed is the first and third-person shooter action figure game you've always dreamed of! Grab your friends, complete objectives, defend the Hypercore against waves of weaponized toys, and defeat Major Evil together in the story campaign.
Hypercharge: Unboxed is coming to PlayStation 4 and 5 later this year!
title: Hypercharge: Unboxed - Official PS5 & PS4 Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Exiled American agent Lucas Reyes (Josh Hartnett) is given one last chance to redeem himself - the assignment is to track down and identify a mysterious, international high-value asset known only as The Ghost on a flight from Bangkok to San Francisco. Complicating matters, the plane is filled with assassins from around the world who are assigned to kill them both. The pair must work together in a fight for their lives. At 37,000 feet, the stakes have never been higher.
title: Fight or Flight - Official Trailer (2025) Josh Hartnett, Katee Sackhoff, Charithra Chandran

author: IGN
description:
It's time for Game of the Year Watch 2025 to begin! According to IGN fans, the shortlist so far is Kingdom Come Deliverance 2, Assassin's Creed Shadows, Split Fiction, Monster Hunter Wilds, and Avowed.

http://www.youtube.com/user/IGNentertainment?sub_confirmation=1

title: What Are the Best Games of 2025 So Far? | GOTY Watch 25

author: IGN
description:
Character creation in InZOI is incredibly in-depth, from fine-tuning the fullness of your cheeks to the color of your hat and nails. If you’re feeling something different or want to achieve a different vibe, be it your hair, clothing, or makeup, this is how you edit your Zoi.

00:00 Intro
00:15 Locked-In Features After Zoi Character Creation
00:28 Editing your Zoi Approach 1
00:55 Editing your Zoi Approach 2
01:14 How to Edit Your Zoi's Desired Life, Preferences, and Ambitions
01:26 For More InZOI Tips

For more inZOI tips and tricks, check out our growing Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/inzoi/

#IGN #Gaming
title: InZOI - How to Edit Your Zoi

author: IGN
description:
The Digimon Adventure 25th Anniversary special music video project, "Digimon Adventure-BEYOND-", which premiered at DIGIMON CON 2025, is now available! A never-before-depicted scene, leading up to the ending of the final episode of "Digimon Adventure 02" 25 years later, has been made into one special promotional video!

Time has passed since that summer adventure, and there are even more children with partner Digimon now. However, because of their unique nature, many children face the looming shadows of persecution and being targeted for military use. While Taichi and Yamato are working to rescue children, they are attacked by mysterious Digimon.
title: Digimon Adventure BEYOND - Official 25th Anniversary Special (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the new Sea of Thieves x Destiny 2 trailer, revealing the action-adventure pirate game's Lightbearer cosmetic items, available now.

Prepare to come face to face with destiny and strike back against the darkness with this radiant Lightbearer gear, including a ship set, weapons, costume set, Silent, Mighty and Wise Collector's items, and a Ship's Crest.

#SeaOfThieves #Destiny2 #Gaming
title: Sea of Thieves x Destiny 2 - Official Lightbearer Cosmetics Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Action-RPG AI Limit is set in a distant future where ecological collapse and war has ravaged the planet. This world is hostile and will punish you if you’re not careful ⁠– so to make your journey a little easier, here are some tips for starting out in AI Limit. Sponsored by CE-ASIA.

#AILimit #Gaming #IGN
title: AI Limit: Tips For Starting Out

author: IGN
description:
In our first hands-on preview with Baby Steps, we experienced what its like to be transported into a new world and learn how to walk again. Blending the control scheme of QWOP with the exploration of an open world without a map or map markers has us intrigued. Previewed by Jada Griffin

#IGN #Gaming
title: Baby Steps: The First Hands-On Preview

author: IGN
description:
After 26 years, Fatal Fury is making its return and stepping out of arcades to take the fighting game series into a new era. We’ve had hands-on early access to the upcoming Fatal Fury: City of Wolves, here’s how the series has been updated. Sponsored by SNK.

#FatalFury #Gaming #IGN
title: How Fatal Fury: City of Wolves Has Been Reinvented For Modern Fighting Fans

author: IGN
description:
We sat down with Henry of Skalitz, Tom McKay, to discuss Kingdom Come: Deliverance II and his role in the popular Warhorse video game.  In less than 2 weeks of hitting both consoles and PC, Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 sold just over 2 million copies with no signs of losing momentum. #kingdomcomedeliverance #kingdomcomedeliverance2 #KCD2 Needless to say Warhorse Studios created quite the medieval experience, and to dive deeper into what makes this franchise so special, IGN host Akeem Lawanson sits with the main man himself - Henry of Skalitz, Tom McKay!

#IGN #Gaming
title: Why Tom McKay Prefers Exploring The Darker Paths in Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch. This week Daemon is joined by IGN's Community Lead, Jada Griffin, and regular Game Scoop co-host Mark Medina to look ahead to the PlayStation 6. There have been tons of games announced during this generation that still haven't seen the light of day, and the chances of them being PS6 titles grows greater with each passing financial quarter. Games like the Splinter Cell remake, Star Wars Eclipse, The Elder Scrolls 6, and more have a good chance of missing the PS5 completely. Plus we have last week's poll results. Let us know in the comments what already announced games you think should be held for the PS6's eventually release.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5
title: The PS6 Games We Already Know About - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Verdansk returns to Call of Duty: Warzone! Ahead of the legendary battleground coming back we wanted to know⁠–where are you dropping first? You voted for your favourite landing spots, and we caught up with IGN staffers and friends to hear some of the unforgettable memories they made in Verdansk. Sponsored by Activision.

#CallOfDuty #Warzone #Gaming
title: Call of Duty: Warzone ⁠– Our Favourite Memories of Verdansk

author: IGN
description:
For centuries, the Oakveil Woodlands went untouched by man, its nature flourishing. That peace has come to an end. A ruthless force has infiltrated from the sea: fierce warriors bound to Megara, their Serpent Queen, corrupting the land and twisting the abundant life into fuel for their deadly weapons. Enter Oakveil, uncover the forbidden alchemy of the Venom Blades, and claim their power before it’s too late.
V Rising's Update 1.1: Invaders of Oakveil launches on April 28 on Steam and PlayStation 5.
title: V Rising: Invaders of Oakveil - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for One Battle After Another, a crime drama thriller distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures.

When their evil enemy resurfaces after 16 years, a group of ex-revolutionaries reunites to rescue one of their own's daughters.

One Battle After Another stars Leonardo DiCaprio, Benicio del Toro, Sean Penn, Regina Hall, Teyana Taylor, and Chase Infiniti, as well as Wood Harris and Alana Haim. The film is directed and written by Paul Thomas Anderson alongside being produced by Paul Thomas Anderson,  Adam Somner, and Sara Murphy.

One Battle After Another will be in theaters and IMAX nationwide on September 26, 2025, and internationally beginning in September 2025.

#IGN #Movies
title: One Battle After Another - Official Trailer (2025) Leonardo DiCaprio, Benicio del Toro
